Backup is disabled. Do you want to adjust backup settings and keep this reminder?
%s has a more recent device or key, are you sure you want to use this older one?
Without a Google Account you will only be able to send, NOT receive messages. Do you want to add a Google account?
We\'d like your help improving SafeSlinger. Would you like to automatically send any errors to us?
All members must upgrade, some are using older key formats.
Microphone permission is required to record a secure voice message. Tap the %s button for SafeSlinger Microphone permission details.
Device does not support backup restore.
Due to a bug in Android 4.1, you will have to uninstall and reinstall SafeSlinger.
A Google account is required. Please open the account manager and add a Google account.
Registration not authenticated, please retry manually later.
Registration is not available for this version, please check for an updated version.
Incorrect device registration with Google. This device does not currently support push messaging.
Push registration service not available, scheduling retry in %d seconds.
Too many applications are registered for Push. Please uninstall some other applications and retry.
Cannot send attachments greater than %d bytes in size.
This device cannot send text messages.
This contact is missing a name, please edit.
This contact is missing a name, please reselect.
%1$s is not supported on %2$s at this time.
A valid contact name is required.
The peer key format is invalid.
SafeSlinger did not detect NDK support on this device, which is required.
You are attempting to send multiple items. At this time, SafeSlinger only supports sending one item at a time.
You have exceeded the message quota for that recipient. Please retry later.
That recipient has a missing or bad push registration. You should stop sending messages to this device.
The message is too big. Reduce the size of the message.
That recipient\'s push registration is no longer valid. The recipient may have uninstalled SafeSlinger or turned off notifications. You should stop sending messages to this device.
There was an error communicating with the push notification service.
You have exceeded the message quota for this device. Please retry later.
Notification service is not available this time. Please try to send the message later.
To start, Sling Keys with another user at the same time.
You need an attachment or a text message to send.
Unable to match public key to private key in crypto provider.
Unable to save to the message database.
Unable to save to the recipient database.
Unable to update the message database.
Unable to update the recipient database.
Use this screen to set your name to exchange with others, and a passphrase to protect your data. Tap the Done button when finished.
To exchange identity data, ensure all users are nearby or on the phone. The Begin Exchange button will exchange only the checked contact data.

You may also change personal data about your identity on this screen by tapping on the button with your name. This will display a menu allowing you to Edit your contact, Create New contact, or Use Another contact.
This screen displays all past messages, and attachments that are still available for download.

Use this screen to login to the application with your passphrase. If you have forgotten your passphrase, you may generate a new key protected by a new passphrase by tapping the Forgot Passphrase? button. Tap the user name to switch between multiple keys.
Use this screen to change your passphrase by entering your last passphrase for confirmation and the new passphrase.
Contacts with SafeSlinger keys are displayed here, select one to send your message to.
When finished, the protocol will reveal a list of the identity data exchanged. Select the contacts you wish to save and press Import.
This screen allows you to select two people you have slung keys with before to securely send their keys to each other. Simply press Introduce when ready.
This screen allows you to select some data and a recipient to send to. Simply press Send when ready.
This screen allows you to change the default settings for the application.
Camera permission is required to attach snapshots to secure messages. Tap the %s button for SafeSlinger Camera permission details.
Contacts permission is required for securely sharing contact cards. Tap the %s button for SafeSlinger Contacts permission details.
Notification permission for either alerts or banners, and badge numbers, are required for secure messaging. Tap the %s button for SafeSlinger Notification permission details.
SafeSlinger is not optimized for iOS 5.x devices. SafeSlinger requires iOS 6 or higher.
Photo Library permission is required to attach pictures to secure messages. Tap the %s button for SafeSlinger Photo Library permission details.
You can select your contact card to send your friends and SafeSlinger will encrypt it for you. To enable this feature, you must allow SafeSlinger access to your Contacts when asked.
You can record a voice message to send your friends and SafeSlinger will encrypt it for you. To enable this feature, you must allow SafeSlinger access to your Microphone when asked.

SafeSlinger is an encrypted messaging application and cannot function without allowing incoming messages from Notifications. To enable incoming messages, you must allow SafeSlinger to send you Notifications when asked.
Your key has changed: Sling Keys again.
To begin messaging, Sling Keys with this user at the same time.
Key format deprecated: Sling Keys again.
Enter your name and a passphrase to protect your data:
Tap your name to add or remove contact data, check items you wish to share, and tap Begin Exchange when others are ready to exchange:
SafeSlinger iCloud is enabled. Tap the Done button when finished.
No messages. You may send a message from the Compose tab.
To add recipients, you must first Sling Keys with one or more other users at the same time. You may also send a Sling Keys contact invitation from the menu.
No shared file. Connect your device with iTunes and drag files to the shared folder.
Pick a recipient to send a message to:
I would like to introduce %s to you.
To setup a secure messaging connection, we can meet or phone each other at the same time, and then Sling Keys just once to verify the connection.
Can we start secure messaging with the open source SafeSlinger iPhone or Android app?
My updated SafeSlinger credentials are attached.
Check contacts you want to update in your address book, then tap Import to save secure contacts:
Automatically download message attachments when logged in.
Automatically decrypt messages when logged in.
Receive notification when backup is offline.
Show a tutorial before attempting to Sling Keys.
Tap and hold to send credential update.
You may optionally enable SafeSlinger iCloud backup in iOS Settings. Tap the Done button when finished.
Touch to configure cache timeout settings.

To protect your data, SafeSlinger does not store your passphrase anywhere for recovery. You may only access recipients and messages created under the same passphrase login. However, you may generate a new key and passphrase, then repeat Sling Keys with your recipients.
The following keys will be deleted:
There are no more recent keys than yours.
Only keys generated more recently than yours, generated on %s, may be deleted.
generating key, this can take a while…

SafeSlinger is designed to easily share identity data, in person or over the phone, authenticated, private, and intact. Each person you share with creates a secure end-to-end channel to send messages.
Easily exchange contact information with others
SafeSlinger: Speak 3 words and forever chat in peace.
Must be installed on a minimum of 2 devices.
An Internet connection must be active.
Select language. Help us on transifex.com.
